title: Component Timelines V3
description: A macro library that adds timelines to components.
longDescription:
This helpful macro library adds timeline functionality to components, since by default actor and scene components can't use timelines like other blueprint classes. Simply search "Timeline" inside an actor or scene component to find the timeline you would like to use. Unlike the default Timelines, you can't create a curve inside the Timeline node, instead you can create curve assets to fit your needs and plug them into the Timeline nodes, or use one of the simple premade curves. These timelines support Float, Vector, and Linear Color curves.


V3 UPDATES

-Added a Set New Time input

-UE5 Compatibility


V2 UPDATES

-Added a Play Rate input variable to each Timeline macro

-Added a Loop input variable to each Timeline macro
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  A macro library containing Timeline macros that can be used inside Components
  •  5 example curve assets (2 Float, 2 Vector, 1 Linear Color)

Number of Blueprints: 1 (Macro Library with 3 Macros)

Network Replicated: n/a

Supported Development Platforms: All

Documentation:

  • Test with Blank Project - https://youtu.be/xRxRL25dYoM
  • Add New Curve - https://youtu.be/7tGc71bxbRk
